articles.title: Houston Post Office Named After Slain Sikh Cop Sandeep Singh Dhaliwal - News18
articles.description: A post office in west Houston has been renamed in the honour of its trailblazing Indian-American Sikh police officer, Sandeep Singh Dhaliwal, who was shot dead in an ambush style attack in 2019.
articles.content: A post office in west Houston has been renamed in the honour of its trailblazing Indian-American Sikh police officer, Sandeep Singh Dhaliwal, who was shot dead in an ambush style attack in 2019. A fa… [+4357 chars]

articles.title: Red Sox beat Yankees in AL wild card, advance to division series - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: The Boston Red Sox defeated the New York Yankees in the American League wild card game, ousting their rivals in a battle at Fenway to claim a spot in the league division series.
articles.content: BOSTON (AP) _ As the ball sailed over the center field fence, landing 427 feet from the plate in a horde of happy Red Sox fans, Xander Bogaerts turned to the Boston dugout to flex his muscles before … [+6961 chars]

articles.title: With scenes from space, TV series shines light on team fixing spectrometer - CNA
articles.description: LONDON :     Filmmaker Ben Turner has turned his lifelong passion for space exploration into a Disney+ original mini series centred around American astronaut Chris Cassidy. "Among the Stars", a six-episode docuseries, takes viewers behind the scenes with Cass…

articles.title: The Latest: J&J seeks FDA OK for vaccine booster doses - The Independent
articles.description: Johnson & Johnson has asked U.S. regulators to allow booster shots of its COVID-19 vaccine as the U.S. government moves toward shoring up protection in more vaccinated Americans
